I'll let you beat the slag out of the pathetic little thief but  no slagging
him, Foxfingers has done a few things for me in this and another RPG and
I've become somewhat sentimental about him, I've had him face one useless
death, I like him as he is so I'll pass on the upgrade.

If you want a fight the mutants are currently near Alliance Island, they've
got mirror sensors and a few other gadgets working for them so they're
hidden from scanners but if Mustex were to somehow stumble onto them on his
way there and you can post a logical post about how they're found we'll have
at it.
----- Original Message -----
From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 18, 2001 4:20 AM
Subject: Zardus and Cyberwolf


> Cyberwolf I have a mutualy benificial proposal. I have this vision
> where Mustex pictures Foxfingers as a deadbeat,to stupid to carry a
> weapon, who has no place in this war(no offence) so if you let Mustex
> slag him you could clone and upgrade him. Zardus Mustex still wants
> to test his power against you.
